Klasse CFile

public abstract class CFile extends Object

    • getRelativeFilePath

      public static File getRelativeFilePath(File file, File dir)
      Get file as path relative to specified directory

      If file is not under directory absolute file path is returned

      Parameter:
      file - file
      dir - directory
      Gibt zurück:
      file object with relative file path

      Read text file

      file - file object
      encoding - encoding string (e.g. "UTF-8")
      Gibt zurück:
      file contents
      Löst aus:

    • writeText

      public static void writeText(File file, String text, boolean append, String encoding) throws IOException
      Write text file
      Parameter:
      file - file object
      text - text to write
      append - if true append text at file end, if false overwrite contents
      encoding - encoding string (e.g. "UTF-8")
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if file not found or on IO error

    • findFilesInDir

      public static List<File> findFilesInDir(File dir, FilenameFilter filter)
      Find all files in the given directory filtered by a filter class
      Parameter:
      dir - directory file object
      filter - filename filter (object of class derived from FilenameFilter)
      Gibt zurück:
      list of files

      Gibt zurück:
      list of files

    • findFilesInDir

      public static List<File> findFilesInDir(File dir, String mask)
      Find all files in the given directory filtered by a file name mask
      Parameter:
      dir - directory file object
      mask - file mask (with * and ?, like used in console programs)
      Gibt zurück:
      list of files

    • findFileInDir

      public static File findFileInDir(File dir, String mask)
      Find (first) file in the given directory filtered by a file name mask
      Parameter:
      dir - directory file object
      mask - file mask (with * and ?, like used in console programs)
      Gibt zurück:
      first file found or null
